text.jpText:
ある休日、出かける途中に
校門前を通りかかると――
text.enText:
On a day off, while I was
walking past the school gate...

text.jpText: うひゃあああああああああー！！

ままま街中で、キ、キ……なんて軟派なこと
してんじゃねぇバッカヤローーー！
text.enText:
Don't ki- I mean, pick up girls
in plain view, you idiots!

text.jpText:
チ、チクショー……早くいかねーと
バイク写真集売り切れちまうってのに……！
text.enText:
Damn it...if I don't hurry up,
they'll sell out of bike photo books!

text.jpText:
なあ、アンタ！　大通りの軟派なヤツら
避ける方法、なんか知らねーか！？
text.enText:
Hey, you! Do you have any idea
how to avoid running into guys
trying to pick up girls in public?

choices.enText: Run past them as fast as you can

text.jpText:
脇道……！　そうだ、
ほかに道があること忘れてた！
text.enText:
A side street? You're right, I totally
forgot I could just take another way!

text.jpText:
ちっとごちゃごちゃ入り組んでっけど、
しょうがねぇ！　急がば回れだぜ！
text.enText:
That'll get a little cramped, but whatever!
Slow and steady wins the race!

text.jpText:
よっしゃ、いってくる！！
ありがとな！！
text.enText: Alright, I'm gonna go then! Thanks!

text.jpText:
……一応言っとっけど、別にキ……が
怖ぇわけじゃねーぞ！　勘違いすんなよ！
text.enText:
Just so you know though, it's not
like I'm scared of ki-.. being hit on!
Don't misunderstand!

text.jpText:
全力疾走……！
見ちまう前に、走り抜けろってことか！？
text.enText:
Running as fast as I can...
So that they don't even get
a chance to approach me?

text.jpText:
いや、俺ならやれる！　やってやらぁ！
光より速く駆けりゃいい話だ！
text.enText:
Yeah, I'm sure I can do that!
I'll dash by them faster than
the speed of light!

text.jpText:
よっしゃ、そうと決まりゃ怖いモンなしだぜ！
サンキューな！！
text.enText:
Alright, I've got nothing to be
afraid of if I do that! Thanks!

text.jpText:
……違う、怖ぇんじゃねぇ、軟派なモンが
嫌いなだけだ！　勘違いすんなよ！
text.enText:
... I mean, not like I'm scared!
I just dislike getting hit on,
don't misunderstand!
